bike.description: Triple-butted 6061 aluminum main tubes, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, PressFit30 BB shell, sloping radius top tube, over-sized seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: X-Fusion Slide 29 RL, Air spring compression, external rebound & lock-out adjust, 15mm axle, 32mm stanchions, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
Mavic Crossride 29, 15mm front, QR rear, straight-pull bladed spokes
Shimano SLX shadow rear and Deore front
Shimano Deore hydraulic disc brakes with 160mm RT56 6-bolt rotors
Ritchey Mountain Comp 2x bar,9° sweep +/-5mm rise 720mm
Ritchey Comp 2-Bolt, 31.6 x 400mm with alloy clamp and cromo seatpin
